Song.title: For Who You Are
Song.copyright: Israel Houghton & Ricardo Sanchez (c)2009 Integrity's Hosanna! Music Integrity's Praise! Music New Breed Extended (Admin. by Integrity's Hosanna! Music)

Arrangement.text:
Intro: [E B C#m G#m E B F#]
Verse 1: [B]I am sp[B/G#]eechless in Your pr[A2]esence I am dra[E]wn by Your loving-k[B]indness I am c[B/G#]aptured by Your b[A2]eauty Lord I w[E]orship You for [C#m]Who You a[F#]re
Chorus 1: You are f[B]airer than ten th[B/G#]ousand You are l[A2]ovelier by f[E]ar Lord Your b[B]eauty knows no m[B/G#]easure God I w[A2]orship Who You a[E]re You're more v[B]alu'ble than s[B/G#]ilver You are l[A2]ovelier by f[E]ar You are [B]awesome You are s[B/G#]ov'reign God I w[A2]orship Who You a[E]re
Bridge: [E]You are a[B]wesome [C#m]You are s[B/D#]ov'reign Go[E]d You are h[B]oly h[F#]oly (h[F#/D#]oly Lo[E]rd) (REPEAT)
{new_page} Chorus 2: You are f[B]airer than ten th[C#m]ousand You are l[B/D#]ovelier by f[E]ar Lord Your b[B/F#]eauty knows no m[B/G]easure God I w[B/G#]orship Who You a[A]re You're more v[B]alu'ble than s[C#m]ilver You are l[B/D#]ovelier by f[E]ar You are [B/F#]awesome You are s[B/G]ov'reign God I w[B/G#]orship Who You a[A]re
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 i am speechless in your presence i am drawn by your lovingkindness i am captured by your beauty lord i worship you for who you are chorus 1 you are fairer than ten thousand you are lovelier by far lord your beauty knows no measure god i worship who you are youre more valuble than silver you are lovelier by far you are awesome you are sovreign god i worship who you are bridge you are awesome you are sovreign god you are holy holy holy lord repeat chorus 2 you are fairer than ten thousand you are lovelier by far lord your beauty knows no measure god i worship who you are youre more valuble than silver you are lovelier by far you are awesome you are sovreign god i worship who you are
